node.text:
Weekends are all about taking it slow and a laid-back brunch is just what you need to get you in that mood. Enjoy some great music, pool time, sociable vibe and a decadent spread at the Sunday Brunch at The Raviz Kovalam.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
